term.longtitle: IUPAC Gold Book - differential molar energy of adsorption
term.title: differential molar energy of adsorption
term.contains: differential molar interfacial energy, differential molar surface excess energy

item.text: When the addition of a differential amount dniσ or dnis is effected at constant gas volume, the differential molar energy of adsorption of component i, Δa.Uiσ or Δa.Uis, is defined as: Δa.Uiσ = Uiσ - Uig, is given by Uiσ = (∂Uσ/∂nis)T,m,njσ = (∂U/∂niσ)T,m,Vg,pi,njσ, by Uis = (∂Uσ/∂nis)T,m,Vg,pi,njσ = (∂U/∂nis)T,m,Vg,Vs,pi,njσ is the differential molar energy of component i in the gas phase, i.e.
